articles.description:
It was late Saturday evening when the news broke Celtic had a bid accepted for St Mirren midfielder Dylan Reid. The Scottish Champions are not just planning for now, but for the future. Chris McCart and the youth scouts have identified Dylan as a massive prospect. The club are willing to put down £125k for […]
Source
articles.title: Celtic Set for Monday Contract Talks

articles.description:
JOE HART made a bad mistake for the first goal when he couldn’t clear his lines click enough. It meant Rapid equalised and the goalkeeper looked disheartened. However, at this point in pre-season, we’re expecting a bit of rustiness from some of the bhoys. Joe and the team have been away relaxing for over a […]
Source
articles.title: Video: Joe Hart’s Brilliant Rapid Vienna Flash Point

articles.description:
Ange Postecoglou insists Celtic are “not stressed” about transfer business, sounding like a man fully in control of the situation this summer. The club have already made significant acquisitions since the end of the season. Jota and Cameron Carter-Vickers have signed up permanently for big fees, while Alexandro Bernabei and Ben Siegrist have also been ...
The post Ange Postecoglou well poised to strike in transfer market after initial Celtic business appeared first on 67 Hail Hail.
articles.title: Ange Postecoglou well poised to strike in transfer market after initial Celtic business

articles.description: Former Scotland defender Alan Hutton has delivered his verdict on the transfer situation surrounding Celtic ace Josip Juranovic.  The lowdown: Instant impact Signed from Legia Warsaw for £2.5m (Sky Sports), the Croatia right-back has been nothing short of sensational since arriving at Parkhead. The 26-year-old was one of numerous new signings last summer as Ange […]
articles.title: 'Can’t turn down...' - BBC Sport man issues worrying Celtic claim on 'different class' workhorse

articles.description:
JOE HART is gearing up for Champions League football six years after he last played in the competition. The English goalkeeper helped Celtic to a famous title win in the 21/22 season and as a result, Celtic will be playing in the Champions League this season. Joe has been in the competition with Manchester City […]
Source
articles.title: Joe Hart Makes Celtic Champions League Statement

articles.description:
Joe Hart is excited to take part in the UEFA Champions League with Celtic this autumn, ending a six-year wait to feature in the competition. Hart last played in the tournament back in the 2015/16 edition, when Manchester City reached the semi-finals only to be narrowly knocked out by Real Madrid. Now, after winning the ...
The post Celtic star is excited to end 6-year career wait at Bhoys appeared first on 67 Hail Hail.
articles.title: Celtic star is excited to end 6-year career wait at Bhoys

articles.description: The Daily Record really is a pitiful arse-rag, isn’t it? Tonight they have a headline up about how Dave King is hobnobbing with the “A-listers” at Wimbledon. I think a better headline would have been the one I put at the top of this. That’s the story after all; that a Hollywood actor found himself […]
articles.title: Tom Cruise Appears At Wimbledon Sitting Near Third Rate Football Crook.

articles.description:
When Celtic fans turn up for a match day, they take everything for granted. The stadium opening on time, the kiosks serving food and the watered down Coca Cola being poured. Police Scotland are heavily involved in the security of the stadium on match days along with standard stewards. The cost to the club is […]
Source
articles.title: Celtic’s Police Scotland Security Bill

articles.description:
It can’t be overstated how difficult it will be for Celtic to qualify from their upcoming UEFA Champions League group into the knockout stages of the competition. Ange Postecoglou’s team enter the draw on August 25th as a pot four outfit, meaning they are regarded as one of the eight weakest sides in the competition. ...
The post The Champions League reality facing Celtic that critics will conveniently forget appeared first on 67 Hail Hail.
articles.title: The Champions League reality facing Celtic that critics will conveniently forget

articles.description:
MOUSSA DEMBELE could be on his way to the Premier League this summer, but it’s not great news for Celtic,. The bhoys sold Moussa for a record fee at the time [£21m] to French side Lyon but also added a sell-on clause. The Hoops always look to get a little extra out of their top […]
Source
articles.title: Moussa Dembele’s Sell On Clause

articles.description:
Joe Ledley thinks Kyogo Furuhashi is going to be even better for Celtic over the coming season than he was last term, greatly praising the Japanese sensation. The Welshman also thinks this special group are going to win the title again. Kyogo made a wonderful impact at the Bhoys in his debut campaign, arriving last ...
The post Joe Ledley makes class Celtic prediction that will be tough for rivals to hear appeared first on 67 Hail Hail.
articles.title: Joe Ledley makes class Celtic prediction that will be tough for rivals to hear

articles.description:
ANGE POSTECOGLOU has delivered a double injury boost for Celtic fans ahead of the next phase of pre-season. The Hoops played out a 3-3 draw against Rapid Vienna on Saturday but did so without Josip Juranovic or Anthony Ralston. Ange allowed Osaze Urhoghide to play at right back in their absence but the defender didn’t […]
Source
articles.title: Double Injury Boost: Ange Clears Up Weekend Mystery

articles.description:
Osaze Urhoghide has had a surprisingly prominent role to play in Celtic’s opening pre-season games, being the only player who has completed both 90 minutes against Wiener Viktoria and Rapid Vienna. Urhoghide has been primarily used as a right-back over both games but also slotted in as a centre-back when Christopher Jullien went off against ...
The post Celtic fringe player praised by Postecoglou after Austria shift appeared first on 67 Hail Hail.
articles.title: Celtic fringe player praised by Postecoglou after Austria shift

articles.description:
Celtic manager Ange Postecoglou has provided an update on Anthony Ralston and Josip Juranovic after they were missing from Saturday’s match squad against Rapid Vienna. The Bhoys boss named almost the entire Austrian group on the bench behind the starters in the 3-3 draw, but the two right-backs were not listed, leading to concerns about ...
The post Ange Postecoglou provides injury update after Saturday Celtic absences appeared first on 67 Hail Hail.
articles.title: Ange Postecoglou provides injury update after Saturday Celtic absences
